application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.52, T.53, T.55, T.56, T.57, T.58 - 6 x Beech trees & T.59 - 1 x Lime tree (all growing along the bank on the roadside boundary). Reduce the crowns by 30% and thin by 10% to reduce weight.
